hero.title: Frequently Asked Questions
hero.subtitle: Find answers to the most popular questions about our services

howToOrder.question: How to place an order on the website?
howToOrder.answer: To place an order: 1) Select a product and add it to cart, 2) Go to cart and click 'Checkout', 3) Fill in contact details and choose delivery method, 4) Confirm the order. After placing the order, you'll receive confirmation via email.

changeOrder.question: Can I change or cancel an order?
changeOrder.answer: You can change or cancel an order within 30 minutes after placing it by contacting us at +375 44 537 1787 or email support@malikli1992.com. Changes are not accepted after the order is sent for processing.

trackOrder.question: How to track order status?
trackOrder.answer: Order status can be tracked in your personal account in the 'My Orders' section. We also send status notifications to the email and phone number provided during checkout.

methods.question: What delivery methods are available?
methods.answer: We offer several delivery methods: courier delivery in Minsk (1-2 days), delivery throughout Belarus by transport companies (2-5 days), pickup from pickup point. See detailed information about cost and timing on the 'Delivery' page.

cost.question: How much does delivery cost?
cost.answer: Delivery cost depends on method and region: in Minsk - from 5 EUR, throughout Belarus - from 10 EUR. For orders over 100 EUR, delivery in Minsk is free. Exact cost is calculated during checkout.

time.question: What are the delivery hours?
time.answer: Courier delivery is performed Monday to Friday from 9:00 to 18:00, Saturday from 10:00 to 16:00. You can choose a convenient time slot when placing your order.

methods.question: What payment methods are accepted?
methods.answer: We accept the following payment methods: Visa/MasterCard bank cards, electronic money (Yandex.Money, WebMoney), bank transfer, cash on delivery (only for courier delivery).

security.question: Is card payment on the website secure?
security.answer: Yes, card payment is completely secure. We use protected SSL connection and comply with PCI DSS security standards. Your card data is not saved on our servers and is transmitted directly to the bank.

when.question: When is money charged from the card?
when.answer: When paying by card, money is charged immediately after order confirmation. When choosing cash payment, money is accepted by the courier upon receiving the goods.

canReturn.question: Can I return a product?
canReturn.answer: Yes, you can return a product within 14 days from receipt according to Belarus legislation. The product must be in original packaging, without signs of use, with preserved tags and receipts.

howToReturn.question: How to process a return?
howToReturn.answer: To process a return, contact us at +375 44 537 1787 or email support@malikli1992.com. We'll arrange product pickup or you can bring it to our office. Money refund is processed within 10 business days.

deliveryCost.question: Is delivery cost refunded when returning?
deliveryCost.answer: Delivery cost is refunded only if the product is defective or doesn't match the description. When returning at buyer's request, delivery cost is not compensated.

registration.question: Is website registration mandatory?
registration.answer: Registration is not mandatory for one-time purchases, but we recommend creating an account for convenience: you can track orders, save delivery addresses, receive personal discounts and bonuses.

forgotPassword.question: How to recover forgotten password?
forgotPassword.answer: On the login page, click 'Forgot password?', enter the email used during registration. We'll send you a password recovery link. If the email doesn't arrive, check your 'Spam' folder.

changeData.question: How to change data in personal account?
changeData.answer: In your personal account, go to 'My Data' section, make necessary changes and save. To change email, confirmation to the new email address is required.

contact.question: How to contact support?
contact.answer: You can contact us: by phone +375 44 537 1787 (Mon-Fri 9:00-18:00), by email support@malikli1992.com, through the contact form on the website. We respond to all inquiries within 24 hours.

loyalty.question: Is there a loyalty program?
loyalty.answer: Yes, we have a bonus program. For each purchase you get bonuses (5% of order amount), which you can use to pay for future purchases. Seasonal promotions and discounts for regular customers are also available.

warranty.question: Do you provide warranty on products?
warranty.answer: All products come with warranty according to Belarus legislation. Additionally, some products have extended manufacturer warranty. Warranty conditions are specified in each product description.

help.title: Didn't find an answer to your question?
help.description: Our support team is ready to help you anytime

general.title: General Provisions
general.intro: These Terms of Use govern the relationship between Malikli1992 (hereinafter - 'Company') and website users regarding the use of the Website and provided services.
general.agreement: By using our website, you agree to these terms and undertake to comply with them. If you disagree with any provisions, please refrain from using our website.

payment.title: Payment Terms
payment.description: Payment is made in Belarusian rubles. Bank cards, electronic payments and cash on delivery are accepted. All prices are inclusive of VAT.

delivery.title: Delivery Terms
delivery.description: Delivery is carried out throughout the Republic of Belarus. Detailed conditions and delivery cost are specified on the corresponding website page.

limitations.description: The Company is not liable for damage caused to the user due to improper use of the Website or provided services, except in cases provided by the legislation of the Republic of Belarus.

jurisdiction.title: Jurisdiction
jurisdiction.description: These Terms of Use are governed by the legislation of the Republic of Belarus. All disputes are resolved in accordance with the current legislation of the Republic of Belarus.

applicableLaw.disputes: In case of disputes, the parties undertake to resolve them through negotiations. If agreement cannot be reached, disputes are considered in court.

contact.title: Questions about terms of use?

updates.title: Changes to Terms of Use
updates.description: The Company reserves the right to make changes to these Terms of Use. Changes take effect from the moment of their publication on the Website. We recommend regularly reviewing this page to familiarize yourself with current terms.

hero.title: Privacy Policy
hero.subtitle: We take the protection of your personal data seriously

general.title: General Provisions
general.intro: This Privacy Policy defines the procedure for processing and protecting personal data of users provided when using the MALIKLI1992 website (hereinafter - 'Website').
general.compliance: Personal data processing is carried out in accordance with the Law of the Republic of Belarus of November 15, 2021 'On Personal Data Protection' and other regulatory acts of the Republic of Belarus.

orders.title: Order Processing
orders.description: Processing, confirming and fulfilling your orders

communication.title: User Communication

marketing.title: Marketing Materials
marketing.description: Sending news and promotional offers (with consent)

improvement.description: Analysis and improvement of our service quality

information.description: Receive complete information about your personal data and methods of its processing

modification.title: Right to Modification
modification.description: Require correction of inaccurate or incomplete personal data

deletion.title: Right to Deletion
deletion.description: Require deletion of your personal data in cases established by law

withdrawal.title: Right to Withdraw Consent
withdrawal.description: Withdraw consent for personal data processing at any time

technical.title: Technical Measures
technical.description: We use modern encryption technologies and secure servers to ensure the security of your data.

organizational.title: Organizational Measures
organizational.description: Only authorized employees who are obliged to maintain confidentiality have access to personal data.

retention.title: Storage Period
retention.description: Personal data is stored no longer than necessary to achieve processing purposes.

when.title: When we transfer data
when.description: Personal data may be transferred to third parties only in cases provided by the legislation of the Republic of Belarus or with your direct consent.
when.government: At the request of authorized government agencies
when.security: To ensure security and prevent fraud

consent.title: Consent for Processing

how.title: How you give consent
how.description: The user gives consent for processing their personal data when registering on the Website or placing an order, by checking the corresponding field.

consent.withdrawal: Consent can be withdrawn at any time by sending written notice to our email address.

updates.title: Changes to Privacy Policy
updates.description: We reserve the right to make changes to this Privacy Policy. Changes take effect from the moment of their publication on the Website. We recommend regularly checking this page to familiarize yourself with the current version of the Policy.

hero.title: Delivery & Payment
hero.subtitle: Fast and reliable delivery throughout Belarus

post.title: Belpost
post.description: Delivery throughout the Republic of Belarus

geography.title: Geography
geography.description: Delivery throughout the Republic of Belarus

payment.title: Payment
payment.description: Cash on delivery or online payment

duration.question: How long does delivery take?
duration.answer: Average delivery time by post is two to five business days. Courier delivery in Minsk takes 1-2 business days.

changeAddress.question: Can I change the delivery address after placing an order?
changeAddress.answer: Yes, you can change the delivery address before the order is shipped. Contact our support service at +375 44 537 1787 or write to support@malikli1992.com.

tracking.question: How to track my order?
tracking.answer: After shipping the order, you will receive a tracking number. You can track the package on the Belpost website or in our personal account.

lostPackage.question: What to do if the package is lost or damaged?
lostPackage.answer: Contact our support service within 48 hours of receipt. We will promptly resolve the issue with the carrier and ensure replacement or refund of the product.

hero.title: Returns & Exchange
hero.subtitle: Simple and transparent product return procedure

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: Contact support within 14 days of purchase

prepare.title: Prepare the Product
prepare.description: Ensure the product is in original condition with tags and packaging

send.title: Send the Product
send.description: Send the product to the specified address or hand it to the courier

receive.title: Receive Refund
receive.description: After product inspection, we will refund or exchange

notAccepted.title: We do not accept for return

legal.title: Legal Information

basis.title: Legislative Basis
basis.description: A product of proper quality can be returned if its appearance, factory labels, tags, consumer properties are preserved, and a document confirming the purchase is attached. Used products cannot be returned.

legal.law: According to Article 28 of the Law of the Republic of Belarus of January 9, 2002 'On Consumer Rights Protection', the consumer has the right to return a product of proper quality or exchange it for a similar product within fourteen days.

timeLimit.question: Within what time can a product be returned?
timeLimit.answer: According to Article 28 of the Law of the Republic of Belarus 'On Consumer Rights Protection', return of a product of proper quality is possible within fourteen days from the date of purchase.

documents.question: What documents are needed for return?
documents.answer: For return, a document confirming the purchase (receipt, payment receipt) is required, as well as a return application that can be filled out when applying.

exchange.question: Can I exchange a product for a different size?
exchange.answer: Yes, exchange for a similar product of different size or color is possible if available in stock. If no suitable product is available, we will process a money refund.

shippingCost.question: Who pays for shipping when returning?
shippingCost.answer: If the product is returned due to seller's fault (defect, non-compliance), we pay for shipping. When returning a product of proper quality, the buyer pays for shipping.

refundTime.question: When will money be returned?
refundTime.answer: Money refund is processed within 7 business days after receiving and checking the returned product to the same payment method used for purchase.

contact.title: Need help with return?
contact.description: Our support service will help you with the return procedure

changePassword.description: Update your password to keep your account secure

hero.title: About MALIKLI1992
hero.subtitle: Creating Exclusive Fashion Since 2025
hero.description: We are a modern fashion brand focused on creating unique, high-quality clothing that reflects the spirit of our time while maintaining timeless elegance.

story.title: Our Story
story.subtitle: From Vision to Reality
story.paragraph1: MALIKLI1992 was born from a passion for creating distinctive fashion that stands out in today's crowded market. Our journey began with a simple yet powerful vision: to design clothing that not only looks exceptional but also tells a story.
story.paragraph2: Every piece in our collection is carefully crafted with attention to detail, quality materials, and innovative design approaches. We believe in the power of fashion to express individuality and create connections between people who share our aesthetic vision.
story.paragraph3: Today, we continue to push the boundaries of contemporary fashion, introducing limited drops that celebrate creativity, exclusivity, and the art of self-expression through clothing.

growth.title: Continuous Growth
growth.description: Building a global community of fashion enthusiasts

creativity.title: Creative Excellence
creativity.description: Pushing boundaries in fashion design and innovation

timeline.sectionSubtitle: Key milestones in our brand evolution

founding.title: Brand Foundation
founding.description: MALIKLI1992 was established with a vision to create unique, high-quality fashion pieces

firstDrops.title: First Collections
firstDrops.description: Launched our inaugural drops, introducing our signature aesthetic to the world

expansion.title: Global Expansion
expansion.description: Extended our reach to international markets, building a worldwide community

future.title: Future Vision
future.description: Continuing to innovate and set new standards in exclusive fashion

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To create exceptional fashion pieces that empower individuals to express their unique style while maintaining the highest standards of quality and exclusivity.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To become a globally recognized fashion brand that sets trends, inspires creativity, and builds a community of people who appreciate distinctive, high-quality design.

values.title: Our Values
values.subtitle: The principles that guide everything we do

exclusivity.title: Exclusivity
exclusivity.description: Limited drops ensure that each piece remains special and unique

quality.title: Quality
quality.description: Premium materials and meticulous craftsmanship in every item

community.title: Community
community.description: Building connections with fashion enthusiasts worldwide

founder.description: Visionary leader driving the creative direction and brand philosophy of MALIKLI1992

cta.title: Join Our Fashion Journey
cta.description: Be part of our exclusive community and stay updated with our latest drops and fashion innovations.
